segments.pli: “Pañcimāni, bhikkhave, indriyāni bhāvitāni bahulīkatāni āsavānaṃ khayāya saṃvattanti.
segments.en: “Mendicants, when these five faculties are developed and cultivated they lead to the ending of defilements.
The faculties of faith, energy, mindfulness, immersion, and wisdom.

segments.pli: imāni kho, bhikkhave, pañcindriyāni bhāvitāni bahulīkatāni āsavānaṃ khayāya saṃvattantīti.
segments.en: When these five faculties are developed and cultivated they lead to the ending of defilements.”

segments.pli: Pañcimāni, bhikkhave, indriyāni bhāvitāni bahulīkatāni saṃyojanappahānāya saṃvattanti, anusayasamugghātāya saṃvattanti, addhānapariññāya saṃvattanti, āsavānaṃ khayāya saṃvattanti.
segments.en: “Mendicants, when these five faculties are developed and cultivated they lead to giving up the fetters, uprooting the underlying tendencies, completely understanding the course of time, and ending the defilements.
The faculties of faith, energy, mindfulness, immersion, and wisdom.

segments.pli: imāni kho, bhikkhave, pañcindriyāni bhāvitāni bahulīkatāni saṃyojanappahānāya saṃvattanti, anusayasamugghātāya saṃvattanti, addhānapariññāya saṃvattanti, āsavānaṃ khayāya saṃvattantī”ti.
segments.en: When these five faculties are developed and cultivated they lead to giving up the fetters, uprooting the underlying tendencies, completely understanding the course of time, and ending the defilements.”
